description.raw:
How to install and run valgrind and perftools: [perftools](http://gazebosim.org/wiki/Troubleshooting#Profiling)

** Valgrind **

Try running valgrind to make sure it's installed properly

  `valgrind --tool=callgrind gzserver`

  'kcachegrind callgrind.out`

Then run atlas

  `roslaunch atlas_utils atlas.launch gzname:=gzserver_callgrind`

  `kcachegrind ~/.gazebo/callgrind.out`

** Perftools **

First try running perftools on the command line to make sure you have installed it properly:

  `perf record gzserver worlds/pr2.world`

  `perf report`

Then try running atlas

  `roslaunch atlas_utils atlas.launch gzname:=gzserver_perf`

  `perf report -i ~/.gazebo/perf.data`
